wikipedia_page.main: William Williams was an English footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He played for Everton, Blackburn Rovers, Bristol City, and Manchester United.

response: * Bill Williams (game designer) (1960–1998), designer and programmer of Atari 8-bit family and Amiga computer games
